reviewText: $40 million, even $45 million, would have been a reasonable and fair price for this fine film.  This is just flat out price gouging.  Shame on all involved.  Will update review if this tape finally drops below the more affordable price of $50 million.
wow is that all only 12 million what a deal , this has to be the best buy in the world  so try it you won't believe it is this low of a price
